snippet.title: Frozen Free Fall: Snowball Fight - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Get ready to turn your living room into an epic puzzle matching battle in Frozen Free Fall: Snowball Fight, featuring 195 FREE levels and an ALL-NEW local multiplayer mode! Challenge your friends & family to a thrilling Snowball Fight where you dodge and throw snowballs by creating cascading combos.  Unleash spectacular power-ups and progress through challenging levels to unlock new characters and even more exciting puzzles! 

Play now for FREE! 
PS4 http://di.sn/6007BJdvT
PS3 http://di.sn/6000BJdvn
Xbox One http://di.sn/6008BJe84
Xbox 360 http://di.sn/6005BJeDB
STEAM http://di.sn/6001BJeDH

Learn more here: http://di.sn/6002BJu0Q
